name: Spaceship Alpha (spaceshipalpha)
description:
Classic side scrolling space shooter set in dynamic hand-drawn worlds. Easy to pick up and hard to put down! Fight your way through waves of enemy ships and huge bosses. Brings back the classic SHMUP experience.

Features:
-Original sound track
-Fun hand-drawn graphics
-Dynamic fast paced play
-Many, many different enemies each level
-Large, multi-part bosses

All levels are open for test play. You do not have to finish one level to unlock another.
Default difficulty is set to Easy, but can be changed. This is the recommended difficulty for first time players.
This build has been tested on a limited number of Android devices.
Appreciate all feedback: error conditions and codes, difficulty levels, level composition, unit behaviors, etc. Really any constructive feedback greatly appreciated!
